12.content:
Tails Was Busy At Work As Usual Building Some New Crazy Gadget Ir Contraption When
Suddenly,He Heard A Knock At His Door.
He Left His Workbench To Go Answer It.
When He Did,No One Was There,But A Polished Golden Arabian Styled Lamp
Sat On His Doorstep.
Tails Picked It Up An Began To Inspect It.
For A Second He Thought About Those Old Legends About Rubbing A Magic Lamp
And A Genie Coming Out.
Being A Boy Of Science,He Didn't Believe In Such Silly Myths,But He Gave it A Try Anyway.

Tails Rubbed The Lamp And Waited A Few Seconds.
Nothing Happened.
"I Knew It! Those Arabian Myths Are Just Abunch Of Horse Sh-...."
Tails Paused For A Second And Noticed That The Lamp Was Beginning To Glow.
A Green Mist Shot Out Of The Tube And A Male Green Mobian Wolf Genie
Floated Before Tails.
"So You Don't Believe In Genies?"
The Genie Asked.
"Impossible!"
Tails Exclaimed.
"Genies Are Very Real Kid,I'll Give You Three Wishes To Prove It To You!"
The Genie Explained.
"But..."
Tails Said Hesitantly.
"Wish For Anything You've Ever Wanted! except more wishes... Genie Code And All That."
The Genie Said.
"Anything...?"
Tails Asked Again.
"Yes! anything!"
The Genie Replied.

"I Wish....___________________________________"
Remember,Each Wish Has A Catch If He Isn't Specific...

1251.content:
To be honest, Tails was... A bit curious. But for the most part, it was to test this so-called genie. Yes, he was a man of science, so to speak, but he wasn't stupid in regards to the supernatural- He had seen things that defied standard laws of nature, and some of Eggman's mechs openly violated the Square-Cube Law. He was dismissive of the supernatural, but he wasn't a dimwit.

"Turn me into an attractive female of my own species, with no changes to my physical or mental capabilities or faculties."

The genie was quick to snap his fingers, causing Tails' form to morph, taking on a highly attractive form reminding him, or her of some females she had known before- The likes of Fiona and Rouge... But still, she crossed her arms, quick to utilize something else.

"I wish I could wish for more wishes."

The genie sighed, shaking his head. It was one of these masters... He took on a far more solid form.

"Alright, alright, if you're going to be like that, I'll give you a different option- I hang around for a while, but you have to be a lot more specific, honey."

What would Tails do...?

Fiona
Sally

Jet

Charmy

Blaze
Sonic

Shadow,Scourge,Metal,And Maria Were Brought Into Different Rooms.

1st Test: Hand-To-Hand Combat.

1551.content:
Rouge the Bat, treasure hunter and a well-known thief on the planet Mobius, had wanted to take a break from her normal lifestyles of stealing and working for G.U.N. So, she decided that she was going to go on a much-needed vacation.

The spot: the desert.

Rouge flew onto the desert wearing a bright pink shirt and a pair of blue jeans. Today, she wanted to be different, and different she was. Within 30 minutes, Rouge had gotten out an umbrella providing shade, a radio for listening to tunes, sunglasses, a folding chair, sun block, and a towel so that she could give herself a natural tan later on

"Ah!" she sighed as she plopped down onto the chair. "This is definitely what I needed!"

But just few minutes after Rouge settled down, she heard a group of cars moving along the sand with several tools in tow.

"Oh, what's going on now?" Rouge said, disgruntled. "All I"m trying to do is have a relaxing vacation, only to be interrupted by noise." She flew up a few feet, and noticed that the caravan was heading towards a pyramid.

Having the curiosity get the best of her, she decided to investigate before saying, "Oh, damn it all!"

Rouge flew by and was not noticed by the team of archaeologists. The pyramid looked nearly hundreds, if not thousands, of years old. "Can't they just leave old buildings in peace?" said Rouge. That's when she saw it.

There was an opening near the top of the pyramid, completely oblivious to the excavators; seeing the opportunity, Rouge decided to go in. It was the perfect size and she got in with no problem.

As she landed with her sneakers on the ground, Rouge saw a beautiful lamp shining right in front of her. Quickly checking her surroundings, Rouge used thieving instincts and grabbed the lamp. "What no traps? Hmph."

She flew out and returned to her nesting grounds as she smiled as she looked at the lamp. "This thing will definitely bring me a couple hundred rings," she said. "Maybe I'll get an extra life out this." (Wink Wink!) Rouge studied the lamp and noticed it was quite dirty. "Might as well clean it up before I sell it."

Rouge used her towel to rub the lamp, when something unexpected happened. The lamp started shaking! Rouge immediately dropped the lamp onto the sand, and backed away. A trail of blue smoke, with a deep booming voice accompanying it.

"Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh." said the voice as the smoke turned into a large muscular figure. It had a round, a small goatee, and wore a puffy hat. "Who dares rub my lamp?"

"I-I-I-I did," stuttered Rouge. The figure looked to where Rouge was and said, "A bat? Ha, ha, ha! You amuse me. It seems that you creatures have developed the creative potential of surviving in the sun. But I digress. What is your name?"

"I am called Rouge the Bat, but you can call me Rouge."

"Very well, Mistress Rouge. I am the Genie of the Lamp, and I shall grant you any wish you may desire. No limitations, whatsoever."

Rouge was stunned at this! Rouge did not believe that genies could exist. Then again, Sonic did have an adventure with one... What harm could it do?

"Well," began Rouge, "I could use a glass of water." "To satisfy your thirst in this dreadful heat, you shall get it," replied the genie. And with a snap of his fingers, a glass of water appeared before Rouge. She instantly drowned it very quickly. "That hit the spot!"

"Anything else my mistress?"

Now that she thought about it...
1551.title: Finding a Lamp

15532.content:
Fiona happened to be searching over Miles' storage facility near the castle hoping to find something helpful for the Destructix when they take on the Suppression Squad for control over Moebius, the vixen was alone for this mission as Scourge thought any more than that could make it easy for them to be spotted but Fiona figured the truth was that he was too afraid of getting caught and if anyone would get caught out of the group she'd likely be number one despite being the lone woman and his girlfriend which prosicely why: with her gone he'd no longer be tied down to a single woman.
She growled as she shined her flashlight over the many different shelves which happened to have labels on everything there so little had to be guessed for Fiona. The vixen was just about to give up as she was only finding boring things and books until she noticed a 'genie lamp' that obviously was in a position Miles hoped it wouldn't be noticed. Fiona was skeptical over it and she picked it up but knew Miles was quite powerful and knowledgeable in magic so if he thought it was the real deal how could she argue otherwise? To test Fiona rubbed the side of the lamp causing a yellow mist to suddenly rise from the lamp's opening to reveal a genie that appearance wise was a female Miles with a belly dancer outfit on. "Hello there new mistress, I am a genie that will now give you three wishes as graditude for freeing me from my lamp. The only condition is that they cannot be used to harm my previous master Miles." Considering her appearance and the mention of not attacking him Miles must've made a wish for her to fall in love with him in the past or something similar which didn't matter to Fiona as she instead thought of what to wish for as two came to mind: she was so close to being a queen of absolute power before the Suppression Squad betrayed Scourge so she could wish to become Queen of Moebius which would also prevent the upcoming battle. The other wish involved Fiona finding a new partner as Scourge seemed more bothered to be in a relationship by the day and the vixen wasn't going to stand for it much longer, there were individuals like Tails but he was too young and heroic but if he became a bad boy...

"So you used my genie to change Tails' morality, become his romantic partner, and change his gender thus changing mine as well." Fiona wasn't sure who Tails was but knew that voice was either Melissa or Miley but considering the chains it had to be Miley. "I previously found her and among the wishes I made was that I would be able to remember changes to reality through the use of technology, science, or magic. I also made her fall in love with me thus giving me unlimited amount of wishes however I could only do three a month and considering I found her only a week ago I wanted her to be hidden where my enemies couldn't find her but...it seems I didn't do a good enough job." Fiona growled as Miley took a few steps over so they could look at each other, "My team has already made the move on the Destructix, any minute now I'll get word that they have joined my side through my specialized 'recruitment process' rendering your entire mission pointless. Once that is done I'll have your team search around Moebius for the lamp until it's found with the first thing that'll be wished for is my gender turned back to normal." Miley then smirked at the defeated vixen before suddenly receiving a message sent from Boomer directly to her via a telepathic spell she taught him.

15532211121.content: Miley showed great disdain for being called mistress on her face but for now let it slide, "Have them along with yourselves search for a lamp that should be somewhere on the planet, I will be there shortly." Fiona was confused as she watched the vixen unaware of her communication with Boomer via the mental plane. "Now let's go find it whore." Fiona was about to respond back before suddenly finding herself moving forward completely in line with her vixen...it seems the chains could control her movements too. Fiona had to think quickly based on the situation at hand and quickly threw out something she'd hope threw Miley off, "You know my girlfriend isn't as attractive as you..." The twin tailed vixen was able to see through the charade immediately but would she play along to humor her or would she shut her down now?

The vixen paused as she tried to make a believable lie, "Well the authority you have over me, I'd be happy to be your bitch."
